website_summaries.verdict: It's a good choice for those who want a streamlined design that's comfortable and complements other contemporary furniture; but it's not the sturdiest chaise lounge on our list.
pros: Earns praise for the arched seat that looks modern and offers comfortable support
Comes in several colors and materials
cons: May not be suitable for heavier individuals, as it feels a little wobbly
Some colors look different in person

customer_reviews.title: Good Chaise for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just received and put together. Pretty easy to do. It looks good, and the color is similar to what is pictured. Its a dark blue -- like a dark unwashed denim more than a navy blue. So far it seems comfortable and stable. Obviously its relatively cheaply made but from a distance you wouldn't know. We'll see how it holds up. The several large silica packets it came shipped with broke during shipping and made a huge mess, so that was frustrating. The box is pretty cumbersome, but the chair itself is light and easy to manipulate.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed w how easy to put together and how attractive the chair is. The material looks very sturdy and the chair is firm. I use a throw pillow in addition to the included pillow to support my back it’s comfortable and I can read or watch tv in it. I did scotchguard the chair since I have multiple dogs. I expect it to last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: dmdanielle

customer_reviews.title: Great addtion
customer_reviews.text: Love this, comfortable with a bigger pillow behind you. I ordered the blue and its a nice shade that goes great with my furniture. Light weight can be pushed across room easily. If you put rug under stays in place. Not saying going to last long if you have kids, but for adult to enjoy for the price would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect. I broke my back four years ago
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. I broke my back four years ago, so being comfortable and supportive is great.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Keller

customer_reviews.title: The color is beautiful. It was extremely easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful. It was extremely easy to assemble. The fabric is soft and luxurious. This was a steal for $119 and provided that extra sitting space we needed for our basement entertainment area. The kids think the design is very fun and enjoy lounging on it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Hollywood feel in my house. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Can every girl just have one of these? I love it. Makes me feel like I’m in a movie. Guys buy girl one today. It’s the best gift she will ever get
customer_reviews.author: Jen Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Super bright and jewel toned
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectations for quality based on the price and reviews; however, the color was very different than pictured. Super bright and jewel toned. Dissapointing as this was the last piece needed for the space and doesn't match at all. Not sure if it is worth the hassle to return though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EASY BREEZY!
customer_reviews.text: So glad, I made the choice to purchase my chaise. It was easy to put together; packaged well and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: MercedesLady

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Great packaging and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Great packaging and easy to assemble. It arrived quicker than expected. Although I’m disappointed it did not come with the pillow as shown in the advertised picture so I only gave 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This Chaise is soooo perfect in my room! Very sleek and sexy! And comfortable! Not just decor for my room but actually useful. Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the back of this chaise very week, if you weight is over 150 lbs dont buy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to install. The hump on the seating part makes it awkward to sit on. Wish I would have gotten a flat one
customer_reviews.author: Habituer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this lounge chair. I am sitting in it as I type.
customer_reviews.author: Dr mommy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and was the best price/value I found anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this chaise!! The pillow included was a pleasesant surprise. It looks amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing accent pillow
customer_reviews.text: Ok I loved the chaise.... However I did not receive the accent pillow!! Is my Pillow coming later?? What happened to the pillow?
customer_reviews.author: tawanna foxx

customer_reviews.title: Grand-daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. She uses it with her lap desk to do her homework. Looks beautiful in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Marengo

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair was easy to put together and it is very comfortable. I wouldn't recommend it for a large person over 250 lbs. because I don't think it would hold up for long-term use.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: I brought this chair, and loving it. it was easy to assembly.
customer_reviews.author: SHUNTARAH

customer_reviews.title: Too Far Back
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect for what I needed but it is OK. It is comfortable. If you knit or crochet this chair makes it hard to do because it lays back do far you can't watch TV and do the craft at the same time. Knitters will understand this. I need 2 pillows, lumbar (included) and neck (purchased) to be remotely comfortable.Otherwise it is a great chair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Swanlake

customer_reviews.title: Good looking chair, well constructed, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Not the heaviest built chair in the world (after all, they have to ship it fedex) but for lounging around in a bedroom, etc, it's fine. Nice soft material. Not made for jumping up and down on or for anyone with an overweight issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tjay Stone

customer_reviews.title: Nice !!
customer_reviews.text: a really nice chaise lounge for the money. it came well packed and assembly was straightforward even though instructions we're typically poor. it looks really nice and it probably won't get a lot of use but we will appreciate it when we do.
customer_reviews.author: Mountains are Calling

customer_reviews.title: Stunner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my living room and no you can't sit on it. Just look and admire its beauty. It's a showcase piece at least in my living room it is!
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Cheryl L. Collins

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT MAKE SAME MISTAKE AND BUY THIS CHAISE
customer_reviews.text: Leg broke from normal seating usage within 60 days. I weight 180 lbs and my wife weight 120 lbs, this should have never happened. Chaise is not sturdy at all. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and shopping around before choosing a chaise. Several of my requirements were no arms, small arch in the leg area (I am short) and a nice fabric. I did not want leather or anything that would make my legs sweat. I am SO pleased with this purchase. I absolutely love it! Now my little reading room is complete! It is so comfortable that I have trouble staying awake to read....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decorative not for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this chaise, it was pretty simple to Assemble. It is very uncomfortable, no cushion or back support.
customer_reviews.author: dianne turner

product_meta.title: Handy Living Cara Chaise in Dark Blue Microfiber
product_meta.description: Style Name:Handy Living Cara Chaise, Dark Blue Microfiber| Color:BlueThis chaise lounge chair features a contemporary sleek design with clean lines, a curved seat and arched back. Perfect for reading, relaxing, watching tv or napping, this comfortable chaise lounge chair is a fashionable piece of furniture featuring sturdy hardwood legs in a dark espresso finish. Covered in a durable, stain resistant dark blue 100% polyester microfiber. Includes a matching decorative accent pillow. Versatile piece of furniture has inviting curves that will create the perfect relaxation spot in your bedroom, living room or den. W-width refers to the seat and back combined for a total of 61 inches. Easy assembly - takes less than 30 minutes to assemble. Sinuous springs to ensure total comfort. Sturdy mixed hardwood frame construction. Non-mar foot glides. Ships in one (1) box.
feature_bullets: This chaise features a contemporary sleek design with clean lines, a curved seat and arched back
Features sturdy hardwood legs in a dark espresso finish
Covered in a durable, stain resistant 100% polyester dark blue microfiber with matching accent pillow
Sinuous springs to ensure total comfort
Takes less than 30 minutes to assemble

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars37 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
